name: src/EOF.js
src/TapeFromCallable.js
TapeFromCallable
description:
Class that wraps a callable with a tape.
Do not use directly. Use {@link fromCallable} instead.

name: constructor
description: The constructor. Stores the callable that yields values to put on the tape.

name: read
description:
Returns the next token on the tape or {@link TapeFromCallable#eof}
if the tape has been exhausted.

name: unread
description:
Puts a token back on the tape. If {@link TapeFromCallable#read} is
used just after, this token will be returned.

params.name: token
params.description: The token to put back on the tape.

name: skip
description: Skips the next token on the tape.

name: skipMany
description: Skip the next `n` tokens on the tape.

params.name: n
params.description: The number of tokens to skip.

name: src/asyncIterableChain.js
asyncIterableChain
description: Utility function to chain an async iterable of async iterables.

name: src/asyncIterableMap.js
asyncIterableMap
description: Utility function to apply a sync callable to each item of an async iterable.

name: src/asyncIterableToArray.js
src/chain.js
chain
description: Converts a tape of tapes of tokens to a tape of tokens.

name: src/exhaust.js
exhaust
description: Exhausts a tape.

name: src/fromArray.js
src/fromAsyncIterable.js
fromAsyncIterable
description: Converts an asynchronous iterable to a tape.

name: src/fromCallable.js
fromCallable
description: Converts a callable to a tape.

name: src/fromIterable.js
fromIterable
description: Converts an iterable to a tape.

name: src/fromIterator.js
fromIterator
description: Converts an iterator to a tape.

name: src/fromReadStream.js
fromReadStream
description: Converts a ReadStream object to a tape.

name: src/fromString.js
src/ignore.js
ignore
description: Filters a tape by ignoring a given set of tokens.

name: src/index.js
src/map.js
map
description: Applies a callable to each token of a tape.

name: src/skip.js
skip
description:
Outputs the next token of a tape that is not contained in a given toskip
set.

name: src/split.js
split
description:
Splits the input tape into a tape of tapes according to some set of
separators. See {@link _split} for the actual implementation.

name: _split
description: Same as {@link split}, but returns an iterator rather than a tape.

name: src/toArray.js
toArray
description: Converts a tape to an array.

name: src/toAsyncIterable.js
toAsyncIterable
description: Converts a tape to an iterable.

name: src/toCallable.js
toCallable
description: Converts a tape to a callable.

name: src/toIterator.js
toIterator
description: Converts a tape to an iterator.

name: src/toString.js
toString
description: Converts a tape to a string.

name: ./README.md
package.json

content: # Overview

name: ./doc/manual/installation.md
content:
# Installation

Can be managed using
[jspm](http://jspm.io)
or [npm](https://github.com/npm/npm).

### jspm
```terminal
jspm install npm:@aureooms/js-tape
```

### npm
```terminal
npm install @aureooms/js-tape --save
```
